statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || true; if git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_status=""; else git_status=" ✗"; fi; git_info=" git:(${branch})${git_status}"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[1;32m➜\033[0m  \033[36m%s\033[0m%s" "$dir" "$git_info"
